original_text: The Lord is your Redeemer, Israel's Holy God. He says this: ‘I will send an army to attack Babylon, so that you, my people, will be safe. I will cause all the Babylonians to run away. They were proud of their great ships, but now they will use them to escape from their enemies. The Lord is your Redeemer, Israel's Holy God. He says this: ‘I will send an army to attack Babylon, so that you, my people, will be safe. I will cause all the Babylonians to run away. They were proud of their great ships, but now they will use them to escape from their enemies. The Lord is your Redeemer, Israel's Holy God. He says this:
korean_text: 너희의 구속자요 이스라엘의 거룩한 이 여호와가 말하노라 너희를 위하여 내가 바벨론에 사람을 보내어 모든 갈대아 사람에게 자기들이 연락하던 배를 타고 도망하여 내려가게 하리라

sentences.original_text: I will send an army to attack Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 바빌론을 공격하기 위해 군대를 보낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: so that you, my people, will be safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나의 백성인 당신들은 안전할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will cause all the Babylonians to run away
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 모든 바빌론 사람들을 도망치게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They were proud of their great ships
but now they will use them to escape from their enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 그들은 원수들에게서 도망치기 위해 그것들을 사용할 것입니다
